name: Firefighters - The Simulation
description: You and your team will experience the exciting work of the professional fire brigade, surviving realistic missions where you extinguish house fires, salvage and neutralize extremely toxic and hazardous substances, and accomplish many other fascinating tasks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows®  Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ X2, min. 2.8 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 512 MB memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: From playing 3 hours of firefighters, i see no problem appert from bug and bad animations.  Like: Only has a time limit for getting to the fire, you can take as long as you want of putting the fire out. Great game play. Love it  Dislikes: Somtimes waiting for a call takes long, animations are bad and some but not too many bugs.  I wouldnt call this game a simulator because i know for a fact that firefighters just go to scenes and back to station, they do more then that.
I like the game in general besides the bugs and crappy animations, but overall it's a great game! :)
